function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low technology adoption in certain regions","Impact":"Increased risk of uncontrolled spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Promote technology education and access in underprivileged regions","Technologies":"Digital tools and platforms for remote monitoring and data analysis","People":"People in underprivileged regions with low access to technology","Owner":"Government and non-profit organizations"},{"Description":"Under-notification of cases","Impact":"Unreliable data for tracking and managing the pandemic","Mitigation":"Improving testing, reporting, and data collection processes","Technologies":"Testing kits, data collection apps, and reporting systems","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and government agencies","Owner":"Healthcare and government organizations"},{"Description":"Digital exclusion in underprivileged regions","Impact":"Limited access to important pandemic information and resources","Mitigation":"Investing in digital infrastructure and providing access to technology in marginalized areas","Technologies":"Internet connectivity, digital devices, and technology education programs","People":"Underprivileged communities with limited access to technology","Owner":"Government, NGOs, and technology companies"}]}
